data.title: RCL Campus & Study Locations in London
data.meta_description: Regent College London has several campuses perfectly situated across London, including Holborn, Wembley, and Harrow.
data.text:
Opening Hours during Term Time

Monday – Thursday: 8:00 am to 9:00 pm

Friday- 8:00 am to 6:00 pm

Saturday – Sunday: 9:00 am to 6:00 pm

Opening Hours during Holidays

Monday – Friday: 8:00 am to 6:00 pm

Saturday – Sunday: Closed

How to find us

Address: Holborn – 2-10 Princeton St, London Wc1R 4Bh

Nearest Tube: Holborn (Piccadily and Central Line) 7 Mins Walk or Chancery Lane (Central Line) 6 Mins Walk.

Buses: 1 – 8 – 19 – 38 – 55 – 59 – 68 – 91 – 98 – 133 – 188 – 243 – N1 – N8 – N19 – N25 – N38 – N41 – N55 – N68 – N91 – N98 – N171 – N207 – N242 – SL6

How to find us

Address: Regent Hill House, 153 Great Titchfield Street, London, W1W 5BD

Nearest Tube: Great Portland Street (Hammersmith & City, Circle and Metropolitan lines) 5 mins Walk or Warrne Street (Norther & Victoria Line) 7 mins Walk and Goodge Street (Norther Line) 11 min walk.

Buses: 1 – 18 – 205 – 27 – 29 – 7
